Name: Nowhere New
About the game: After crash-landing on a mysterious planet, novice engineer Nova Collins must unravel the secrets of a town’s messy past to escape it. Explore an enigmatic town and its unique characters Choose who to trust with your limited information Learn more about this place and about yourself Try not to lose what’s most important to you along the way… Nowhere New is a mystery game that tells an intensely personal story about family, identity, and trust, intertwined with its engaging gameplay. Check out the game's soundtrack, available on all major streaming services.
